name: Block 2D - Retro Arcade Game
description:
A simple minimalistic game with retro arcade inspired design.
Stack blocks as perfect as you can. Get three perfect matches to get rewarded.

"Easy enough to become very addictive, but it's also tough enough to keep you a good challenge as well and keep your interest." - Geeks Corner

"Wow! 3 minutes in and i am already addicted!!! Totally worth the $1.99 asking price. It is always nice to find a casual game I can play on my watch while waiting for my Starbucks." - Gerald Kirchner

Features:
• Play on Apple iOS, Apple TV and Apple Watch!
• Short game sessions
• iOS 9.3 - iOS 12 Support
• Retro sound and music.
• iPhone X,iPhone Xr ,iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max Support
• Apple Watch Series 3 Support
• Apple Watch Series 4 Support
• Apple TV Support.
• Game Center.
• Super small App Size
• Apple Metal 1, Metal 2 Suport,
• Apple exclusive game.
• 60 fps.(smooth gameplay)
